methods: static Device getLocalDevice(Context context) Returns the Device representation of the local device, which can be used when defining local data sources.
String getManufacturer() Returns the manufacturer of the product/hardware.
String getModel() Returns the end-user-visible model name for the device.
int getType() Returns the constant representing the type of the device.
String getUid() Returns the serial number or other unique ID for the hardware

int TYPE_PHONE Constant indicating the device is an Android phone.
